Public JSON files

committee-info.json
Committee (PMC) names and membership (docs)
committee-retired.json
Summary details of retired committees (docs)
icla-info.json
Names of people who have submitted ICLAs who have uids (committer accounts) (docs)
icla-info_noid.json
Names of people who have submitted ICLAs who don't (yet) have uids (committer accounts) (docs)
member-info.json
ASF Member id listing (docs)
pods-scan.json
Current status of Incubator podling websites relating to required navigation links (docs)
public_ldap_authgroups.json
Membership of LDAP auth groups. Membership of an LDAP auth group is used to grant commit karma for sub-project and other resources (docs)
public_ldap_groups.json
Membership of the remaining LDAP unix groups (apsite, committers and member). (docs)
public_ldap_people.json
Basic details of LDAP personal entries. Shows the public name and whether the login is currently disabled (docs)
public_ldap_projects.json
Details of PMCs and Podlings. The 'owners' list holds the ids with (P)PMC karma, and the 'members' list holds the ids with (P)PMC committer karma. (docs)
public_ldap_roles.json
Membership of LDAP role groups. For example committers shows the list of people with committer karma (docs)
public_ldap_services.json
Membership of LDAP service groups. For example pmc_chairs shows the list of people with PMC chair karma (docs)
public_nonldap_groups.json
Membership of auth groups not defined in LDAP. (this file is likely to become obsolete) (docs)
public_podling_status.json
Current Incubation status of each podling (docs)
public_podlings.json
Listings of podling data TODO? (docs)
site-scan.json
Current status of project websites relating to required navigation links (docs)

For more information see API docs and the public JSON generator scripts.
